on reading compounds: 閃亜鉛鉱【センアエンコウ】sphalerite, zinc blende
閃ウラン鉱【センウランコウ】uraninite
電光一閃【デンコウイッセン】flash of lightning
kun reading compounds: 閃く【ひらめく】to flash (e.g. lightning), to flicker, to glitter, to sparkle, to gleam, to flutter (e.g. flag), to wave, to undulate, to flash into one's mind (e.g. an idea), to come to one suddenly
閃き【ひらめき】flair, flash, insight, flash (of inspiration, wit, etc.), waving (e.g. of a flag in the wind)
